Title: 39249 - # DIY Projects For a Fantastic Smelling Home
Direction: 500 words. Write about 3-6 DIY projects homeowners can undertake to make their homes smell wonderful. Give an array of project ideas, like creating homemade reed diffusers, potpourri sachets, or room sprays. Your audience likes easy home improvement projects that don't involve spending a lot of money or using chemicals. The AT goes to an HVAC company; you could make one subheading about how to clean things that tend to add bad scents to the home, and talk about changing the AC's filters to incorporate the link. Please link to this blog post, and not the client’s homepage: http://aircontrolheatingandcooling.com/article/steps-healthy-home
